00018 #define SELECT_WIDTH 0.08
00019 #define SELECT_DEPTH 0.05

00024 XQGraphPainter::XQGraphPainter(const shared_ptr<XGraph> &graph, XQGraph* item) :
00025     m_graph(graph),
00026     m_pItem(item),
00027     m_selectionStateNow(Selecting),
00028     m_selectionModeNow(SelNone),
00029     m_listpoints(0),
00030     m_listaxes(0),
00031     m_listgrids(0),
00032     m_listplanes(0),
00033     m_bIsRedrawNeeded(true),
00034     m_bIsAxisRedrawNeeded(false),
00035     m_bTilted(false),
00036     m_bReqHelp(false)
00037 {
00038     openFont();
00039     item->m_painter.reset(this);
00040     m_lsnRedraw = graph->onUpdate().connectWeak(
00041         shared_from_this(), &XQGraphPainter::onRedraw,
00042         XListener::FLAG_MAIN_THREAD_CALL | XListener::FLAG_AVOID_DUP | XListener::FLAG_DELAY_ADAPTIVE);
00043 }
00044 
00045 float
00046 XQGraphPainter::resScreen() {
00047     return 1.0f/max(m_pItem->width(), m_pItem->height());
00048 } 
00049 
00050 void
00051 XQGraphPainter::repaintGraph(int x1, int y1, int x2, int y2)
00052 {
00053     repaintBuffer(x1, y1, x2, y2);
00054 }
00055 
00056 void
00057 XQGraphPainter::posOffAxis(const XGraph::ScrPoint &dir, 
00058                            XGraph::ScrPoint *src, XGraph::SFloat offset) {
00059     XGraph::ScrPoint scr, dir_proj;
00060     windowToScreen(m_pItem->width() / 2, m_pItem->height() / 2, 0.0, &scr);
00061     windowToScreen(m_pItem->width() / 2, m_pItem->height() / 2, 1.0, &dir_proj);
00062     dir_proj -= scr;
00063     dir_proj.normalize();
00064     double x, y, z;
00065     if(screenToWindow(*src, &x, &y, &z)) return;
00066     x = x / m_pItem->width() - 0.5;
00067     y = y / m_pItem->height() - 0.5;
00068     double r1 = x*x + y*y;
00069     XGraph::ScrPoint s1 = dir_proj;
00070     s1.vectorProduct(dir);
00071     s1.normalize();
00072     s1 *= offset;
00073     *src += s1;
00074     int ret = screenToWindow(*src, &x, &y, &z);
00075     x = x / m_pItem->width() - 0.5;
00076     y = y / m_pItem->height() - 0.5;
00077     double r2 = x*x + y*y;
00078     if(ret || ((r2 - r1) * offset < 0) ) {
00079         *src -= s1;
00080         *src -= s1;
00081     }
00082 }
00083 
00084 shared_ptr<XAxis> 
00085 XQGraphPainter::findAxis(const XGraph::ScrPoint &s1)
00086 {
00087     shared_ptr<XAxis> found_axis;
00088     double zmin = 0.1;
00089     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> axes_list(m_graph->axes()->children());
00090     if(axes_list) { 
00091         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = axes_list->begin(); it != axes_list->end(); it++)
00092         {
00093             shared_ptr<XAxis> axis = dynamic_pointer_cast<XAxis>(*it);
00094             XGraph::SFloat z1;
00095             XGraph::ScrPoint s2;
00096             axis->axisToScreen(axis->screenToAxis(s1), &s2);
00097             z1 = sqrtf(s1.distance2(s2));
00098             if(zmin > z1) {
00099                 zmin = z1;
00100                 found_axis = axis;
00101             }
00102         }
00103     }
00104     return found_axis;
00105 }
00106 shared_ptr<XPlot> 
00107 XQGraphPainter::findPlane(const XGraph::ScrPoint &s1,
00108                           shared_ptr<XAxis> *axis1, shared_ptr<XAxis> *axis2)
00109 {
00110     double zmin = 0.1;
00111     shared_ptr<XPlot> plot_found;
00112     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> plots_list(m_graph->plots()->children());
00113     if(plots_list) { 
00114         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = plots_list->begin(); it != plots_list->end(); it++)
00115         {
00116             shared_ptr<XPlot> plot = dynamic_pointer_cast<XPlot>(*it);
00117             XGraph::GPoint g1;
00118             shared_ptr<XAxis> axisx = *plot->axisX();
00119             shared_ptr<XAxis> axisy = *plot->axisY();
00120             shared_ptr<XAxis> axisz = *plot->axisZ();
00121             plot->screenToGraph(s1, &g1);
00122             if((fabs(g1.x) < zmin) && axisz) {
00123                 plot_found = plot;
00124                 zmin = fabs(g1.x);
00125                 *axis1 = axisy;
00126                 *axis2 = axisz;
00127             }
00128             if((fabs(g1.y) < zmin) && axisz) {
00129                 plot_found = plot;
00130                 zmin = fabs(g1.y);
00131                 *axis1 = axisx;
00132                 *axis2 = axisz;
00133             }
00134             if(fabs(g1.z) < zmin) {
00135                 plot_found = plot;
00136                 zmin = fabs(g1.z);
00137                 *axis1 = axisx;
00138                 *axis2 = axisy;
00139             }
00140         }       
00141     }
00142     return plot_found;
00143 }
00144 
00145 void
00146 XQGraphPainter::selectObjs(int x, int y, SelectionState state, SelectionMode mode)
00147 {
00148     m_pointerLastPos[0] = x;
00149     m_pointerLastPos[1] = y;
00150 
00151     if(m_bReqHelp) {
00152         if(state != SelStart) return;
00153         m_bReqHelp = false;
00154         return;
00155     }
00156     double z;
00157     
00158     m_selectionStateNow = state;
00159     switch(state) {
00160     case SelStart:
00161         m_selectionModeNow = mode;
00162         m_selStartPos[0] = x;
00163         m_selStartPos[1] = y;
00164         m_tiltLastPos[0] = x;
00165         m_tiltLastPos[1] = y;
00166         switch(mode) {
00167         case SelPlane:
00168             m_foundPlane.reset();
00169             z = selectPlane(x, y, 
00170                             (int)(SELECT_WIDTH * m_pItem->width()), 
00171                             (int)(SELECT_WIDTH * m_pItem->height()),
00172                             &m_startScrPos, &m_startScrDX, &m_startScrDY);
00173             if(z < 1.0)
00174                 m_foundPlane = findPlane(m_startScrPos, &m_foundPlaneAxis1, &m_foundPlaneAxis2);
00175             m_finishScrPos = m_startScrPos;
00176             break;
00177         case SelAxis:
00178             m_foundAxis.reset();
00179             z = selectAxis(x, y, 
00180                            (int)(SELECT_WIDTH * m_pItem->width()),
00181                            (int)(SELECT_WIDTH * m_pItem->height()),
00182                            &m_startScrPos, &m_startScrDX, &m_startScrDY);
00183             if(z < 1.0) m_foundAxis = findAxis(m_startScrPos);
00184             m_finishScrPos = m_startScrPos;
00185             break;
00186         default:
00187             break;
00188         }
00189         break;
00190     case Selecting:
00191         //restore mode
00192         mode = m_selectionModeNow;
00193         break;
00194     case SelFinish:
00195         //restore mode
00196         mode = m_selectionModeNow;
00197         m_selectionModeNow = SelNone;
00198         break;
00199     }
00200     switch(mode) {
00201     case SelNone:
00202         m_foundPlane.reset();
00203         z = selectPlane(x, y, 
00204                         (int)(SELECT_WIDTH * m_pItem->width()),
00205                         (int)(SELECT_WIDTH * m_pItem->height()),
00206                         &m_finishScrPos, &m_finishScrDX, &m_finishScrDY);
00207         if(z < 1.0)
00208             m_foundPlane = findPlane(m_finishScrPos, &m_foundPlaneAxis1, &m_foundPlaneAxis2);
00209         break;
00210     case SelPlane:
00211         selectPlane(x, y, 
00212                     (int)(SELECT_WIDTH * m_pItem->width()),
00213                     (int)(SELECT_WIDTH * m_pItem->height()),
00214                     &m_finishScrPos, &m_finishScrDX, &m_finishScrDY);
00215         break;
00216     case SelAxis:
00217         selectAxis(x, y, 
00218                    (int)(SELECT_WIDTH * m_pItem->width()),
00219                    (int)(SELECT_WIDTH * m_pItem->height()),
00220                    &m_finishScrPos, &m_finishScrDX, &m_finishScrDY);
00221         break;
00222     case TiltTracking:
00223     {
00224         float x0 = (float)m_tiltLastPos[0] / m_pItem->width() - 0.5;
00225         float y0 = (1.0f - (float)m_tiltLastPos[1] / m_pItem->height()) - 0.5;
00226         float z0 = 0.5;
00227         float x1 = (float)x / m_pItem->width() - 0.5;
00228         float y1 = (1.0f - (float)y / m_pItem->height()) - 0.5;
00229         float z1 = z0;
00230         float x2, y2, z2;
00231         x2 = y0 * z1 - z0 * y1;
00232         y2 = z0 * x1 - x0 * z1;
00233         z2 = x0 * y1 - y0 * x1;
00234         float k = sqrt(x2*x2 + y2*y2 + z2*z2);
00235         x2 /= k; y2 /= k; z2 /= k;
00236         viewRotate( -pow(k/(z0/4), 1.4f)*90, x2, y2, z2);
00237         m_tiltLastPos[0] = x;
00238         m_tiltLastPos[1] = y;
00239     }
00240     break;
00241     default:
00242         break;
00243     }
00244     if(state == SelFinish) {
00245         if((abs(x - m_selStartPos[0]) < 3) && (abs(y - m_selStartPos[1]) < 3)) {
00246             switch(mode) {
00247             case SelPlane:
00248                 break;
00249             case SelAxis:
00250             {
00251                 XScopedLock<XGraph> lock(*m_graph);
00252                 if(!m_foundAxis) {
00253                     //if no axis, autoscale all axes
00254                     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> axes_list(m_graph->axes()->children());
00255                     if(axes_list) { 
00256                         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = axes_list->begin(); it != axes_list->end(); it++)
00257                         {
00258                             shared_ptr<XAxis> axis = dynamic_pointer_cast<XAxis>(*it);
00259                             if(axis->autoScale()->isUIEnabled())
00260                                 axis->autoScale()->value(true);
00261                         }
00262                     }
00263                 }
00264                 else {
00265                     if(m_foundAxis->autoScale()->isUIEnabled())
00266                         m_foundAxis->autoScale()->value(true);
00267                 }
00268             }
00269             break;
00270             case TiltTracking:
00271                 viewRotate(0.0, 0.0, 0.0, 0.0, true);
00272                 break;
00273             default:
00274                 break;
00275             }
00276         }
00277         else {
00278             XScopedLock<XGraph> lock(*m_graph);
00279             switch(mode) {
00280             case SelPlane:
00281                 if(m_foundPlane && !(m_startScrPos == m_finishScrPos) ) {
00282                     XGraph::VFloat src1 = m_foundPlaneAxis1->screenToVal(m_startScrPos);
00283                     XGraph::VFloat src2 = m_foundPlaneAxis2->screenToVal(m_startScrPos);
00284                     XGraph::VFloat dst1 = m_foundPlaneAxis1->screenToVal(m_finishScrPos);
00285                     XGraph::VFloat dst2 = m_foundPlaneAxis2->screenToVal(m_finishScrPos);
00286                 
00287                     if(m_foundPlaneAxis1->minValue()->isUIEnabled())
00288                         m_foundPlaneAxis1->minValue()->value(double(min(src1, dst1)));
00289                     if(m_foundPlaneAxis1->maxValue()->isUIEnabled())
00290                         m_foundPlaneAxis1->maxValue()->value(double(max(src1, dst1)));
00291                     if(m_foundPlaneAxis1->autoScale()->isUIEnabled())
00292                         m_foundPlaneAxis1->autoScale()->value(false);
00293                     if(m_foundPlaneAxis2->minValue()->isUIEnabled())
00294                         m_foundPlaneAxis2->minValue()->value(double(min(src2, dst2)));
00295                     if(m_foundPlaneAxis2->maxValue()->isUIEnabled())
00296                         m_foundPlaneAxis2->maxValue()->value(double(max(src2, dst2)));
00297                     if(m_foundPlaneAxis2->autoScale()->isUIEnabled())
00298                         m_foundPlaneAxis2->autoScale()->value(false);
00299                 
00300                 }
00301                 break;
00302             case SelAxis:
00303                 if(m_foundAxis && !(m_startScrPos == m_finishScrPos) ) {
00304                     XGraph::VFloat src = m_foundAxis->screenToVal(m_startScrPos);
00305                     XGraph::VFloat dst = m_foundAxis->screenToVal(m_finishScrPos);
00306                     double _min = std::min(src, dst);
00307                     double _max = std::max(src, dst);
00308                     if(m_foundAxis->minValue()->isUIEnabled())
00309                         m_foundAxis->minValue()->value(_min);
00310                     if(m_foundAxis->maxValue()->isUIEnabled())
00311                         m_foundAxis->maxValue()->value(_max);
00312                     if(m_foundAxis->autoScale()->isUIEnabled())
00313                         m_foundAxis->autoScale()->value(false);
00314                 }
00315                 break;
00316             default:
00317                 break;
00318             }
00319         }
00320     }
00321     
00322     repaintGraph(0, 0, m_pItem->width(), m_pItem->height() );
00323 }
00324 
00325 void
00326 XQGraphPainter::wheel(int x, int y, double deg)
00327 {
00328     double a = ((double)x / m_pItem->width() - 0.5);
00329     double b = ((double)y / m_pItem->height() - 0.5);
00330     if( max(fabs(a), fabs(b)) < 0.35) {
00331         zoom(min(1.15, max(0.85, exp(deg * 0.04))), x, y);
00332     }
00333     else {
00334         if( (a - b) * (a + b) > 0 ) {
00335             viewRotate(30.0 * deg / fabs(deg), -1.0, 0.0, 0.0, false);
00336         }
00337         else {
00338             viewRotate(30.0 * deg / fabs(deg), 0.0, 1.0, 0.0, false);
00339         }
00340         repaintGraph(0, 0, m_pItem->width(), m_pItem->height() );
00341     }
00342 }
00343 void
00344 XQGraphPainter::zoom(double zoomscale, int , int )
00345 {
00346     XGraph::ScrPoint s1(0.5, 0.5, 0.5);
00347   
00348     XScopedLock<XGraph> lock(*m_graph);
00349     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> axes_list(m_graph->axes()->children());
00350     if(axes_list) { 
00351         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = axes_list->begin(); it != axes_list->end(); it++)
00352         {
00353             shared_ptr<XAxis> axis = dynamic_pointer_cast<XAxis>(*it);
00354             if(axis->autoScale()->isUIEnabled())
00355                 axis->autoScale()->value(false);
00356         }
00357     }
00358     m_graph->zoomAxes(resScreen(), zoomscale, s1);
00359 }
00360 void
00361 XQGraphPainter::onRedraw(const shared_ptr<XGraph> &)
00362 {
00363     redrawOffScreen();
00364     repaintGraph(0, 0, m_pItem->width(), m_pItem->height() );  
00365 }
00366 void
00367 XQGraphPainter::drawOnScreenObj()
00368 {
00369     QString msg = "";
00370 //   if(SelectionStateNow != Selecting) return;
00371     switch ( m_selectionModeNow )
00372     {
00373     case SelNone:
00374         if(m_foundPlane) {
00375             XGraph::VFloat dst1 = m_foundPlaneAxis1->screenToVal(m_finishScrPos);
00376             XGraph::VFloat dst1dx = m_foundPlaneAxis1->screenToVal(m_finishScrDX) - dst1;
00377             XGraph::VFloat dst1dy = m_foundPlaneAxis1->screenToVal(m_finishScrDY) - dst1;
00378             XGraph::VFloat dst2 = m_foundPlaneAxis2->screenToVal(m_finishScrPos);
00379             XGraph::VFloat dst2dx = m_foundPlaneAxis2->screenToVal(m_finishScrDX) - dst2;
00380             XGraph::VFloat dst2dy = m_foundPlaneAxis2->screenToVal(m_finishScrDY) - dst2;
00381 
00382             dst1 = setprec(dst1, sqrt(dst1dx*dst1dx + dst1dy*dst1dy));
00383             dst2 = setprec(dst2, sqrt(dst2dx*dst2dx + dst2dy*dst2dy));
00384             msg += QString("(%1, %2)")
00385                 .arg(m_foundPlaneAxis1->valToString(dst1))
00386                 .arg(m_foundPlaneAxis2->valToString(dst2));
00387         }
00388         else {
00389             msg = KAME::i18n("R-DBL-CLICK TO SHOW HELP");
00390         }
00391         break;
00392     case SelPlane:
00393         if(m_foundPlane && !(m_startScrPos == m_finishScrPos) ) {
00394             XGraph::VFloat src1 = m_foundPlaneAxis1->screenToVal(m_startScrPos);
00395             XGraph::VFloat src1dx = m_foundPlaneAxis1->screenToVal(m_startScrDX) - src1;
00396             XGraph::VFloat src1dy = m_foundPlaneAxis1->screenToVal(m_startScrDY) - src1;
00397             XGraph::VFloat src2 = m_foundPlaneAxis2->screenToVal(m_startScrPos);
00398             XGraph::VFloat src2dx = m_foundPlaneAxis2->screenToVal(m_startScrDX) - src2;
00399             XGraph::VFloat src2dy = m_foundPlaneAxis2->screenToVal(m_startScrDY) - src2;
00400             XGraph::VFloat dst1 = m_foundPlaneAxis1->screenToVal(m_finishScrPos);
00401             XGraph::VFloat dst1dx = m_foundPlaneAxis1->screenToVal(m_finishScrDX) - dst1;
00402             XGraph::VFloat dst1dy = m_foundPlaneAxis1->screenToVal(m_finishScrDY) - dst1;
00403             XGraph::VFloat dst2 = m_foundPlaneAxis2->screenToVal(m_finishScrPos);
00404             XGraph::VFloat dst2dx = m_foundPlaneAxis2->screenToVal(m_finishScrDX) - dst2;
00405             XGraph::VFloat dst2dy = m_foundPlaneAxis2->screenToVal(m_finishScrDY) - dst2;
00406 
00407             src1 = setprec(src1, sqrt(src1dx*src1dx + src1dy*src1dy));
00408             src2 = setprec(src2, sqrt(src2dx*src2dx + src2dy*src2dy));
00409             dst1 = setprec(dst1, sqrt(dst1dx*dst1dx + dst1dy*dst1dy));
00410             dst2 = setprec(dst2, sqrt(dst2dx*dst2dx + dst2dy*dst2dy));
00411             msg += QString("(%1, %2) - (%3, %4)")
00412                 .arg(m_foundPlaneAxis1->valToString(src1))
00413                 .arg(m_foundPlaneAxis2->valToString(src2))
00414                 .arg(m_foundPlaneAxis1->valToString(dst1))
00415                 .arg(m_foundPlaneAxis2->valToString(dst2));
00416         
00417             XGraph::ScrPoint sd1, sd2;
00418             m_foundPlaneAxis1->valToScreen(dst1, &sd1);
00419             m_foundPlaneAxis1->valToScreen(src1, &sd2);
00420             sd1 -= sd2;
00421             sd1 += m_startScrPos;
00422             XGraph::ScrPoint ss1, ss2;
00423             m_foundPlaneAxis2->valToScreen(dst2, &ss1);
00424             m_foundPlaneAxis2->valToScreen(src2, &ss2);
00425             ss1 -= ss2;
00426             ss1 += m_startScrPos;
00427         
00428             beginQuad(true);
00429             setColor(clBlue, 0.2);
00430             setVertex(m_startScrPos);
00431             setVertex(sd1);
00432             setVertex(m_finishScrPos);
00433             setVertex(ss1);
00434             endQuad();
00435         }
00436         break;
00437     case SelAxis:
00438         if(m_foundAxis && !(m_startScrPos == m_finishScrPos) ) {
00439             XGraph::VFloat src = m_foundAxis->screenToVal(m_startScrPos);
00440             XGraph::VFloat srcdx = m_foundAxis->screenToVal(m_startScrDX) - src;
00441             XGraph::VFloat srcdy = m_foundAxis->screenToVal(m_startScrDY) - src;
00442             XGraph::VFloat dst = m_foundAxis->screenToVal(m_finishScrPos);
00443             XGraph::VFloat dstdx = m_foundAxis->screenToVal(m_finishScrDX) - dst;
00444             XGraph::VFloat dstdy = m_foundAxis->screenToVal(m_finishScrDY) - dst;
00445                 
00446             src = setprec(src, sqrt(srcdx*srcdx + srcdy*srcdy));
00447             dst = setprec(dst, sqrt(dstdx*dstdx + dstdy*dstdy));
00448         
00449             msg += QString("%1 - %2")
00450                 .arg(m_foundAxis->valToString(src))
00451                 .arg(m_foundAxis->valToString(dst));
00452         
00453             XGraph::GFloat src1 = m_foundAxis->valToAxis(src);
00454             XGraph::GFloat dst1 = m_foundAxis->valToAxis(dst);      
00455             beginQuad(true);
00456             setColor( clRed, 0.4 );
00457             XGraph::ScrPoint s1, s2, s3, s4;
00458             m_foundAxis->axisToScreen(src1, &s1);
00459             posOffAxis(m_foundAxis->dirVector(), &s1, -0.02);
00460             m_foundAxis->axisToScreen(src1, &s2);
00461             posOffAxis(m_foundAxis->dirVector(), &s2, +0.02);
00462             m_foundAxis->axisToScreen(dst1, &s3);
00463             posOffAxis(m_foundAxis->dirVector(), &s3, +0.02);
00464             m_foundAxis->axisToScreen(dst1, &s4);
00465             posOffAxis(m_foundAxis->dirVector(), &s4, -0.02);
00466             setVertex(s1);
00467             setVertex(s2);
00468             setVertex(s3);
00469             setVertex(s4);
00470             endQuad();
00471             beginLine();
00472             setColor( clBlue, 1.0 );
00473             m_foundAxis->axisToScreen(src1, &s1);
00474             posOffAxis(m_foundAxis->dirVector(), &s1, -0.1);
00475             m_foundAxis->axisToScreen(src1, &s2);
00476             posOffAxis(m_foundAxis->dirVector(), &s2, 0.05);
00477             setVertex(s1);
00478             setVertex(s2);
00479             m_foundAxis->axisToScreen(dst1, &s1);
00480             posOffAxis(m_foundAxis->dirVector(), &s1, -0.1);
00481             m_foundAxis->axisToScreen(dst1, &s2);
00482             posOffAxis(m_foundAxis->dirVector(), &s2, 0.05);
00483             setVertex(s1);
00484             setVertex(s2);
00485             endLine();
00486         }
00487         break;
00488     case TiltTracking:
00489         break;
00490     default:
00491         break;
00492     }
00493     m_onScreenMsg = msg.utf8();
00494 }
00495 void
00496 XQGraphPainter::showHelp()
00497 {
00498     m_bReqHelp = true;
00499     repaintGraph(0, 0, m_pItem->width(), m_pItem->height());
00500 }
00501 void
00502 XQGraphPainter::drawOnScreenViewObj()
00503 {
00504     //Draw Title
00505     setColor(*m_graph->titleColor());
00506     defaultFont();
00507     m_curAlign = AlignTop | AlignHCenter;
00508     drawText(XGraph::ScrPoint(0.5, 0.99, 0.01), *m_graph->label());
00509   
00510     if(m_onScreenMsg.length() ) {
00511         selectFont(m_onScreenMsg, XGraph::ScrPoint(0.6, 0.05, 0.01), XGraph::ScrPoint(1, 0, 0), XGraph::ScrPoint(0, 0.05, 0), 0);
00512         setColor(*m_graph->titleColor());
00513         m_curAlign = AlignBottom | AlignLeft;
00514         drawText(XGraph::ScrPoint(0.01, 0.01, 0.01), m_onScreenMsg);
00515     }
00516     //Legends
00517     if(*m_graph->drawLegends() &&
00518             (m_selectionModeNow == SelNone)) {
00519         atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> plots_list(m_graph->plots()->children());
00520         if(plots_list && plots_list->size()) {
00521             float z = 0.98;
00522             float dy = 0.04;
00523             float x1 = 0.75;
00524             float y1 = 0.81;
00525             if(m_pointerLastPos[0] > m_pItem->width() / 2)
00526                 x1 = 1.06f - x1;
00527             if(m_pointerLastPos[1] < m_pItem->height() / 2)
00528                 y1 = 1.0f - y1 + plots_list->size() * dy;
00529             float x2 = x1 - 0.01;
00530             float x3 = x1 + 0.08;
00531             defaultFont();
00532             m_curAlign = AlignVCenter | AlignRight;
00533             float y2 = y1;
00534             for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = plots_list->begin(); it != plots_list->end(); it++)
00535             {
00536                 shared_ptr<XPlot> plot = dynamic_pointer_cast<XPlot>(*it);
00537                 selectFont(*plot->label(), XGraph::ScrPoint(x2,y2,z), XGraph::ScrPoint(1, 0, 0), XGraph::ScrPoint(0, dy, 0), 0);
00538                 y2 -= dy;
00539             }
00540             setColor(*m_graph->backGround(), 0.7);
00541             beginQuad(true);
00542             setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(x1, y1 + dy/2, z));
00543             setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(x1, y2 + dy/2, z));
00544             setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(x3, y2 + dy/2, z));
00545             setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(x3, y1 + dy/2, z));
00546             endQuad();
00547             setColor(*m_graph->titleColor(), 0.05);
00548             beginQuad(true);
00549             setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(x1, y1 + dy/2, z));
00550             setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(x1, y2 + dy/2, z));
00551             setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(x3, y2 + dy/2, z));
00552             setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(x3, y1 + dy/2, z));
00553             endQuad();
00554             m_curAlign = AlignVCenter | AlignRight;
00555             float y = y1;
00556             for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = plots_list->begin(); it != plots_list->end(); it++)
00557             {
00558                 setColor(*m_graph->titleColor(), 1.0);
00559                 shared_ptr<XPlot> plot = dynamic_pointer_cast<XPlot>(*it);
00560                 drawText(XGraph::ScrPoint(x2,y,z), *plot->label());
00561                 plot->drawLegend(this, XGraph::ScrPoint((x3 + x1)/2, y, z), (x3 - x1)/1.5f, dy/1.2f);
00562                 y -= dy;
00563             }
00564         }
00565     }
00566     
00567     if(m_bReqHelp) drawOnScreenHelp();
00568 }
00569 void
00570 XQGraphPainter::drawOnScreenHelp()
00571 {
00572     float z = 0.99;
00573     setColor(*m_graph->backGround(), 0.3);
00574     beginQuad(true);
00575     setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(0.0, 0.0, z));
00576     setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(1.0, 0.0, z));
00577     setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(1.0, 1.0, z));
00578     setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(0.0, 1.0, z));
00579     endQuad();
00580     setColor(*m_graph->titleColor(), 0.55);
00581     double y = 1.0;
00582     beginQuad(true);
00583     setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(1.0 - y, 1.0 - y, z));
00584     setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(1.0 - y, y, z));
00585     setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(y, y, z));
00586     setVertex(XGraph::ScrPoint(y, 1.0 - y, z));
00587     endQuad();
00588     y -= 0.02;
00589     setColor(*m_graph->backGround(), 1.0);
00590     defaultFont();
00591     m_curAlign = AlignTop | AlignHCenter;
00592     drawText(XGraph::ScrPoint(0.5, y, z), KAME::i18n("QUICK HELP!"));
00593     m_curAlign = AlignVCenter | AlignLeft;
00594     y -= 0.1;
00595     double x = 0.1;
00596     double dy = -y/10;
00597     selectFont(KAME::i18n("Single Click Right Button on Axis : Auto-scale"), XGraph::ScrPoint(x,y,z), XGraph::ScrPoint(1, 0, 0), XGraph::ScrPoint(0, dy, 0), 0);
00598     
00599     drawText(XGraph::ScrPoint(x, y, z), KAME::i18n("Press Left Button on Plot : Manual Scale"));
00600     y += dy;
00601     drawText(XGraph::ScrPoint(x, y, z), KAME::i18n("Press Right Button along Axis: Manual Scale"));
00602     y += dy;
00603     drawText(XGraph::ScrPoint(x, y, z), KAME::i18n("Single Click Right Button on Axis : Auto-scale"));
00604     y += dy;
00605     drawText(XGraph::ScrPoint(x, y, z), KAME::i18n("Single Click Right Button elsewhere : Auto-scale all"));
00606     y += dy;
00607     drawText(XGraph::ScrPoint(x, y, z), KAME::i18n("Press Middle Button : Tilt plots"));
00608     y += dy;
00609     drawText(XGraph::ScrPoint(x, y, z), KAME::i18n("Single Click Middle Button : Reset tilting"));
00610     y += dy;
00611     drawText(XGraph::ScrPoint(x, y, z), KAME::i18n("Wheel around Center : (Un)Zoom all Plots"));
00612     y += dy;
00613     drawText(XGraph::ScrPoint(x, y, z), KAME::i18n("Wheel at Side : Tilt by 30deg."));
00614     y += dy;
00615     drawText(XGraph::ScrPoint(x, y, z), KAME::i18n("Double Click Left Button : Show Dialog"));
00616     y += dy;
00617     drawText(XGraph::ScrPoint(x, y, z), KAME::i18n("Double Click Right Button : This Help"));
00618 }

00620 void
00621 XQGraphPainter::drawOffScreenStart()
00622 {
00623     m_graph->setupRedraw(resScreen());
00624 }
00625 void
00626 XQGraphPainter::drawOffScreenPlanes()
00627 {
00628     setColor((QRgb)*m_graph->backGround(), 0.3);
00629     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> plots_list(m_graph->plots()->children());
00630     if(plots_list) { 
00631         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = plots_list->begin(); it != plots_list->end(); it++)
00632         {
00633             shared_ptr<XPlot> plot = dynamic_pointer_cast<XPlot>(*it);
00634             XGraph::GPoint g1(0.0, 0.0, 0.0),
00635                 g2(1.0, 0.0, 0.0),
00636                 g3(0.0, 1.0, 0.0),
00637                 g4(1.0, 1.0, 0.0),
00638                 g5(0.0, 0.0, 1.0),
00639                 g6(0.0, 1.0, 1.0),
00640                 g7(1.0, 0.0, 1.0),
00641                 g8(1.0, 1.0, 1.0);
00642             XGraph::ScrPoint s1, s2, s3, s4, s5, s6, s7, s8;
00643             plot->graphToScreen(g1, &s1);
00644             plot->graphToScreen(g2, &s2);
00645             plot->graphToScreen(g3, &s3);
00646             plot->graphToScreen(g4, &s4);
00647             plot->graphToScreen(g5, &s5);
00648             plot->graphToScreen(g6, &s6);
00649             plot->graphToScreen(g7, &s7);
00650             plot->graphToScreen(g8, &s8);
00651             beginQuad(true);
00652             setColor( *m_graph->backGround(), 0.2);
00653             setVertex(s1);
00654             setVertex(s2);
00655             setVertex(s4);
00656             setVertex(s3);
00657             shared_ptr<XAxis> axisz = *plot->axisZ();
00658             if(axisz) {
00659                 setVertex(s1);
00660                 setVertex(s2);
00661                 setVertex(s7);
00662                 setVertex(s5);
00663                 setVertex(s1);
00664                 setVertex(s3);
00665                 setVertex(s6);
00666                 setVertex(s5);
00667             }
00668             endQuad();
00669         }
00670     }
00671 }
00672 void
00673 XQGraphPainter::drawOffScreenGrids()
00674 {
00675     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> plots_list(m_graph->plots()->children());
00676     if(plots_list) { 
00677         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = plots_list->begin(); it != plots_list->end(); it++)
00678         {
00679             shared_ptr<XPlot> plot = dynamic_pointer_cast<XPlot>(*it);
00680             plot->drawGrid(this, m_bTilted);
00681         }
00682     }
00683 }
00684 void
00685 XQGraphPainter::drawOffScreenPoints()
00686 {
00687     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> plots_list(m_graph->plots()->children());
00688     if(plots_list) { 
00689         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = plots_list->begin(); it != plots_list->end(); it++)
00690         {
00691             shared_ptr<XPlot> plot = dynamic_pointer_cast<XPlot>(*it);
00692             plot->drawPlot(this);
00693         }
00694     }
00695 }
00696 void
00697 XQGraphPainter::drawOffScreenAxes()
00698 {
00699     atomic_shared_ptr<const XNode::NodeList> axes_list(m_graph->axes()->children());
00700     if(axes_list) { 
00701         for(XNode::NodeList::const_iterator it = axes_list->begin(); it != axes_list->end(); it++)
00702         {
00703             shared_ptr<XAxis> axis = dynamic_pointer_cast<XAxis>(*it);
00704             if((axis->direction() != XAxis::DirAxisZ) || m_bTilted)
00705                 axis->drawAxis(this);
00706         }
00707     }
00708 }
